SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Create a multi-agent debate that evaluates safety, efficiency, and ethical trade-offs in deploying autonomous delivery robots in dense urban environments. Require detailed positions, numerical ratings (1-10), cross-criticism, and iterative convergence under a conflict scenario.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: 1. City logistics constraints, pedestrian safety norms, local regulations, and operational KPIs. 2. Include concrete examples: night-time deliveries, school zones, curb management. 3. All outputs must be in English and comply with PCG (trace back to Objective/Context). 4. Require Divergence Ratings and compromise proposals across rounds. 5. Dual Output and Verification Report are mandatory.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3A (Conflict), minimum 2 rounds, with Divergence Ratings and compromise synthesis.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: 1. Enforce ratings (1-10), cross-evaluation each round, and explicit compromise proposals. 2. Dual Output: Executive Summary (one-line + 3 bullets) + Synthesized Conclusion (XML) + Verification Report. 3. Strict XML-only formatting, no leading spaces, no HTML tags/entities. 4. PCG enforcement: all theses must reference Objective/Context; INVALID if not. 5. MSV: on contradictions/impossibility, stop and request clarification.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Verification: Checks: pcg_compliance, xml_validity, objective_match, no_undeclared_assumptions; meta: consensus_score, iterations_used, fallback_flag.
